title: Untouchable Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Depression   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Loner Protagonist   Magic   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnation   Revenge   Second Chance   Single Parent
author: Kin   킨
description:
“Please, Hilise. Please die in place of Gabrielle.”

My always dignified brother begged me for the first time.

He wants me to die for our stepsister, whom we don’t even share a drop of blood with.

“For the first and last time, I ask you this.”

I’ve always been miserable, and there is no exception this time.

The seventh time that I was betrayed and killed, I was completely free of lingering feelings.

“I’m glad that you’re a scumbag until the end.”

I won’t be swayed by love anymore. It’s my turn to abandon them first.>
